fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use your ability at any time, and it resolves immediately.
- Anything that would happen that phase that hasn't already happened doesn't. End-of-night actions don't resolve, including things like a Vigilante committing suicide from guilt or a Pirate attacking a target who already lost a duel.
- You may only use your ability once during the day and once during the night.
